Hi there! My name is Laura Bandi and I am a first-year PhD student in Psychological Science at Toronto Metropolitan University (TMU) studying under the supervision of Dr. Alyssa Counsell in the Psychology And Statistics Education Research (PASER) Lab.

**Research Interests**

-   Differences in statistical literacy across fields of study and education levels

-   Post-secondary students' self-efficacy in learning statistics, attitudes towards statistics, and statistics anxiety

-   Improving statistics and research methods courses in the social sciences

-   Psychometrics and scale development

-   Scholarship of teaching and learning
